Elliotte,

Thank you for the offer, but we are fairly certain that we do no=
t want to include the graphical runners in JUnit 4. I can see that they mig=
ht be useful in a teaching situation, but we are assuming that an IDE will =
always be available or that the textual interface will suffice.

Sincerely =
yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
